articles.author: Ivan Mehta
articles.title: Google starts blocking users from sideloading certain apps in Singapore - TechCrunch
articles.description: Google has started a new program to prevent users from sideloading certain apps in Singapore to reduce financial scams.
articles.content: To reduce financial scams, Google has started a new program to prevent users from sideloading certain apps in Singapore. The company is looking to block sideloaded apps that abuse Android permissions… [+3063 chars]

articles.title: Radio Maps May Reveal the Universe’s Biggest Magnetic Fields - Quanta Magazine
articles.description: A controversial technique has produced detailed maps of the magnetic fields in colossal galaxy clusters. If confirmed, the approach could be used to reveal where cosmic magnetic fields come from.
articles.content:
By making maps of the magnetic fields hidden inside massive galaxy clusters, astronomers are getting closer to finding the origin of cosmic magnetism.
